notes: Paragraphs 0 (SECTION 23 31 13) and 1 (METAL DUCTS) have no pStyle - creating CSI_SectionID__ARCH and CSI_SectionName__ARCH derived from these exemplars.

Paragraph 194 (END OF SECTION) uses 'EndSection' style and is not part of CSI hierarchy - left unchanged.
